app.name: Pado
app.tagline: A time to embrace your inner waves

learning.title: Learn about Anxiety
learning.subtitle: Waves only stay for a moment. Learn to meet the deep stillness within you.

acc_01.text: The waves may rise high, but you, the ocean, remain deep and vast.
acc_01.subText: It’s okay if you don't force the anxiety to settle.

acc_02.text: You are not the crashing waves, but the ocean that embraces them.
acc_02.subText: Anxiety is just white foam that vanishes as it reaches the shore.

acc_03.text: No matter how rough the surface is, your deepest sea is always still.
acc_03.subText: Take a breath and feel the deep calm within you.

val_01.text: The lighthouse shining over your ocean is as bright as ever.
val_01.subText: Where does your ocean want to head in this very moment?

val_02.text: Wherever the waves may pull, just looking at the horizon is enough.
val_02.subText: It's not about how high the waves are, but the direction you hold.

act_01.text: A single shift in the current can change your entire ocean.
act_01.subText: What is the smallest move you can make right now?

act_02.text: The tiny ripple you start today will eventually reach the shore you dream of.
act_02.subText: There is true strength in the flow your will creates.

act_03.text: Believe in the traces your waves leave today, more than grand changes.
act_03.subText: Small flows gather to complete your own beautiful ocean.

rest_01.text: It’s okay to sink into the deep sea and rest. Stillness is part of the ocean, too.
rest_01.subText: Pause every flow for a moment and just be there for yourself.

rest_02.text: Instead of trying to beat the waves, let them flow and catch your breath.
rest_02.subText: Even without effort, your ocean is always right here.
